Most influential jazz albums include 'Kind of Blue' by Miles Davis, 'A Love Supreme' by John Coltrane, 'The Shape of Jazz to Come' by Ornette Coleman, 'Time Out' by Dave Brubeck, and 'Mingus Ah Um' by Charles Mingus.

Searching for detailed information about 'Kind of Blue' by Miles Davis.

'Kind of Blue' is a studio album by American jazz trumpeter Miles Davis, released on August 17, 1959. It is regarded as one of the greatest jazz albums of all time and has been influential in the development of modal jazz.
